briefdescription.para: Read alpha value from band.

detaileddescription.para: Is combined with value from raster transparency / global alpha value. Default: -1 (not set)

briefdescription.para: Origin of min/max values.
Global alpha value (0-1)
Raster transparency per color or value. Overwrites global alpha value.
Constructor for QgsRasterRenderer.
QgsRasterRenderer cannot be copied. Use clone() instead.
Gets number of bands.

memberdef.argsstring: (int bandNo, const QgsRectangle &extent, int width, int height, QgsRasterBlockFeedback *feedback=nullptr) override=0
memberdef.name: block

briefdescription.para: Read block of data using given extent and size.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns pointer to data. Caller is responsible to free the memory returned.
bandNo
band number
extent
extent of block
width
pixel width of block
height
pixel height of block
feedback
optional raster feedback object for cancelation/preview. Added in QGIS 3.0.

briefdescription.para: Clone itself, create deep copy.
Copies common properties like opacity / transparency data from other renderer.
Returns data type for the band specified by number.
Gets symbology items if provided by renderer.
Returns const reference to origin of min/max values.
Returns the opacity for the renderer, where opacity is a value between 0 (totally transparent) and 1.0 (fully opaque).
QgsRasterRenderer cannot be copied. Use clone() instead.
Sets base class members from xml. Usually called from create() methods of subclasses.
Set input.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true if set correctly, false if cannot use that input

briefdescription.para: Sets origin of min/max values.
Sets the opacity for the renderer, where opacity is a value between 0 (totally transparent) and 1.0 (fully opaque).
Returns a list of band numbers used by the renderer.
Write upper class info into rasterrenderer element (called by writeXml method of subclasses)
Raster renderer pipe that applies colors to a raster.
